attributes.action: BBC must reinstate lyrical performance Rule Britannia and Land of Hope & Glory
attributes.additional_details: The BBC is the BRITISH broadcasting corp and we, the British people, are proud of our country. We fund the organisation and it should cater to its culturally diverse U.K. audience equally  as stated in its Charter.
attributes.background: Put pressure on the BBC to reinstate Proms songs lyrics

rejection.details:
This is an operational matter for the BBC, not the UK Government or Parliament.

Nevertheless, since you started your petition the BBC has announced that Rule, Britannia! and Land of Hope and Glory will be sung at the Proms by a group of BBC singers: https://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/articles/5tFp5RpjZVLQmcqdx1ypVp2/update-on-last-night-of-the-proms.
